title: SHOW DYNAMIC TABLES command and DYNAMIC_TABLES function: New changes to output (Pending) | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_08 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The SHOW DYNAMIC TABLES and DYNAMIC_TABLES output behaves as follows:
The output of the SHOW DYNAMIC TABLES command and the DYNAMIC_TABLES function does not include the is_iceberg column.

The output of the SHOW DYNAMIC TABLES command and the DYNAMIC_TABLES function includes the is_iceberg column, which is defined as
follows:
Y if the table is an Apache Iceberg™ dynamic table; otherwise, N.
